name: Cats' stall
description:
You are a little snail trying to keep warm on an autumn day. Your friend the cat is ready to help you with this! Eat food, dodge ice cream, collect money and don't freeze!

How to play:

  • A & D to move
  • Buy bonuses
  • Collect as much money as possible

Bonuses:

  1. Speed up (Can be upgraded only 4 times)
  2. Coffee(Stay warm longer. Can be upgraded only 4 times)
  3. Leaf(Protects you from icecream and helps to collect food)*
  4. Plaid(Warms you)*

* - only for 1 loop

P.S. Have fun :)
